title: BRIEF-Cobra’S Puerto Rico Contract Further Increased To Approximately $945 Million
text: 10 minutes ago BRIEF-Cobra’S Puerto Rico Contract Further Increased To Approximately $945 Million Reuters Staff Feb 28 (Reuters) - Mammoth Energy Services Inc: * COBRA’S PUERTO RICO CONTRACT FURTHER INCREASED TO APPROXIMATELY $945 MILLION * MAMMOTH ENERGY SERVICES - UNIT, COBRA ACQUISITIONS EXECUTED AMENDMENT TO CONTRACT TO ASSIST IN RESTORATION OF ELECTRIC INFRASTRUCTURE ON PUERTO RICO​ * MAMMOTH ENERGY SERVICES INC - ‍IN AMENDMENT, PRIOR CONTRACT AMOUNT OF APPROXIMATELY $445 MILLION HAS BEEN INCREASED TO APPROXIMATELY $945 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Brief@thomsonreuters.com)
